# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $120 by me due to its high-quality materials and unique features. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $110. I believe this is a fantastic deal and hope you'll find it irresistible. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
